name: CREC
purpose: This function will return the given field as an R type (record or 4 byte integer) field.

parts.description: The field to be converted to R type.

return_type: R The original field is not changed.
comments: An F type field cannot be converted to R; however, all others can. If an L type field is converted, a .T. value will be converted to 1, a .F. to 0.
